name: Marudhar Metals
overview:
Year of Establishment 2008 We, “Marudhar Metal & Alloys”, well recognized trader and supplier of a wide assortment of Inconel, Monel, Hastelloy, SMO and 904 L Scraps.

Our Products: SMO Scraps Metal Scraps Ferro Alloys tainless Steel Products Nickel & Cobalt Alloy Scraps Chromium Metals Stainless Steel Scraps Nickel Alloy Pipes & Tubes Titanium Scraps Hastelloy Products

Our Team: In order to bring qualitative product line into the market, we have appointed a team skilled and experienced professionals. Our highly adroit team consists of various professionals who have vast experience in our domain and are well versed with the conceptual knowledge.

Our Quality Assurance: Since our establishment, we have been committed towards quality in our products as per the international quality standard. We are backed by diligent quality auditors who are highly experienced in this domain and possess vast industry experience.

Client Satisfaction: To gain utmost client satisfaction is the prime goal of our business operations. In every possible manner, hundred percent client satisfaction is always been in the core of our business. We strongly believe utmost client satisfaction and for this, we avail them qualitative products which are procured from the reliable and authentic vendors.

Vendor Base: Being a quality centric organization, we believe in procuring the qualitative products. For this reason, we have tied up with only reliable and well-established vendors in order to garner our product line. Our products are acclaimed by the clients because they are procured from the leading vendors.
